text: The dollar has been the currency of Barbados since 1935. The present dollar has the ISO 4217 code BBD. It is normally abbreviated with the dollar sign "$". Sometimes it is written "Bds$" to be different from other currencies that are called dollar. It is divided into 100 cents. == Other websites == * Banknotes of Barbados Category:Barbados Category:Currency of North America Category:1935 establishments in North America Category:20th-century establishments in Barbados
title: Barbadian dollar
